result.content: Improving incident resolution time increases customer satisfaction.
result.name: Improve time to resolve incidents

result.content: Define health inclusion rules to specify the scope of CIs that are included in health calculations. You can narrow the scope, if needed. Health inclusion rules can be specified per domain.
result.name: Define inclusion rules

result.content: Use Service Level Management notifications so the fulfillment team can prioritize their work appropriately.
result.name: Implement Service Level Management notifications

result.content:
1. Use Problem Management for the handling of major incidents to get the right teams engaged to minimize the impact and time to resolve an incident.
  2. Investigate problems to identify the root cause of an incident so you can document and implement solutions to problems.
  3. Watch this recorded webinar before getting started.

Note: Please work with your System Admin to implement this recommendation using Guided Setup.
result.name: Implement Problem Management

result.content: Use multiple knowledge bases for separate workflows to update, publish, and retire articles.
result.name: Implement v3 Knowledge bases

result.content: Use on-call scheduling to send notifications to the appropriate teams about high Priority incidents.
result.name: Implement On-call scheduling

result.content: Use Visual Task Boards to transform the navigation of lists and forms into an interactive graphical experience.
result.name: Implement Visual Task Boards (VTB)

result.content: Direct users to the Self-Service portal so they can manage their basic service needs.
result.sys_name: Direct users to the Self-Service portal
result.name: Direct users to the Self-Service portal

result.content:
1. Use emergency change types only to resolve an outage, a serious disruption, or a major incident.
  2. Require an incident or problem to ensure that the emergency change is being used properly.
result.sys_name: Define and enforce policies for true emergency changes when resolving an outage, serious disruption, or major incident
result.name: Define and enforce policies for true emergency changes when resolving an outage, serious disruption, or major incident

result.content: Refine the number of categories and assignment groups for incidents to improve categorization and auto assignment. Watch this recorded webinar before getting started.
result.name: Improve incident classification

result.content: Establish best practices and governance for the efficient and accurate identification, management, and dissemination of knowledge to ensure the most relevant information is available to the organization. Up to date knowledge is critical to the success of a knowledge base.
result.name: Improve the Knowledge Management process

result.content: Learn how to use ServiceNow applications to support the following ITIL processes: Incident Management, Service Catalog and Request Fulfillment, Change Management, Configuration Management, Knowledge Management, and Problem Management.
result.name: Get acquainted with ITSM processes

result.content: Use the Standard change catalog for pre-authorized changes that are low risk, relatively common, and follow a procedure or work instruction. Standard changes do not require review and approval.
result.name: Implement a Standard Change Catalog

result.content:
1. Monitor service levels and receive notification when service levels are not being met, or are close to being breached. 
  2. Provide escalation notices to the appropriate teams when the delivery time is close to being breached so that work can be prioritized.
result.name: Implement Service Level Management

result.content: Use conflict detection to detect whether planned changes conflict with other changes, or have other scheduling issues. Reduce conflicts in advance so you can schedule changes in a planned and expedient manner.
result.name: Implement conflict detection

result.content: Use Performance Analytics dashboards to analyze the trends and determine the areas impacting this KPI.
result.sys_name: Use Performance Analytics dashboards for analysis
result.name: Use Performance Analytics dashboards for analysis

result.content:
Use Connect Chat for support agents to provide real-time assistance to end users using queues. Chat information can be logged directly into the incident. 

Live assistance allows for real-time resolution of an incident, as well as immediate transfer of the incident to the appropriate support team.
result.sys_name: Implement Connect Chat to increase collaboration for a faster resolution
result.name: Implement Connect Chat to increase collaboration for a faster resolution

result.content: Use Password Reset so end users can reset their passwords using a self-service automated process, which significantly reduces the volume of incidents opened.
result.sys_name: Implement more self-service options such as automated password reset, and request VPN access
result.name: Implement more self-service options such as automated password reset, and request VPN access

result.content: Use of Service Catalog moves the creation of requests out of Incident Management, allowing fulfiller teams to prioritize resolution of incidents on first touch. Watch this webinar before getting started.
result.name: Implement Service Catalog for requests

result.content: Use contextual search to configure fields on forms and record producers to automatically display knowledge search results based on the text entered in those fields.
result.sys_name: Deflect and resolve incidents with contextual search
result.name: Deflect and resolve incidents with contextual search

result.content:
1. Enable knowledge feedback on articles so users can provide comments, click on the Helpful box if they found the article helpful, and specify a rating.
  2. Set up notifications to monitor and respond to comments and article feedback so that articles can be updated, if needed.
result.sys_name: Enable Knowledge feedback (comments, helpful, and rating items)
result.name: Enable Knowledge feedback (comments, helpful, and rating items)

result.content: Reduce the incident reassignment count for a faster time to resolve (TTR). Use Performance Analytics content packs for ITSM to analyze reassignment count data in prebuilt dashboards.
result.sys_name: Reduce the number of incident reassignments
result.name: Reduce the number of incident reassignments

result.content: Use vendor ticketing to put the requested item in a pending state, which pauses the SLA, when additional information is dependent on an end user or vendor.
result.name: Implement vendor ticketing

result.content:
Use the Intelligent Automation Engine to help predict category, priority, and assignment group using past incidents. Auto categorization can improve KPI value by up to 20% to help get incidents to the right team.

Talk to your ServiceNow account representative for available integration options.
result.sys_name: Activate the Intelligent Automation Engine, which uses past incidents to help predict the category, priority, and assignment group
result.name: Activate the Intelligent Automation Engine, which uses past incidents to help predict the category, priority, and assignment group

result.content:
1. Use the Change Advisory Board (CAB) workbench to simplify CAB meetings, which enables change managers to easily schedule, plan, and manage meetings from a single source.
  2. Increase the frequency of CAB meetings to reduce the misuse of the Emergency change type, which expedites the implementation of a change.
  3. Increase the efficiency of emergency CAB meetings to provide greater oversight to emergency change requests.
result.sys_name: Implement the Change Advisory Board (CAB) workbench
result.name: Implement the Change Advisory Board (CAB) workbench

result.content:
Use Coaching Loops for a structured way to provide feedback to your agents and track their progress over time. You can grade agent performance, inform agents of possible improvements, and ensure agents are following your processes correctly.

Developing your agents better serves your organization and helps stay compliant with various regulations.
result.name: Implement Coaching Loops

result.content: Use team-wide lists, reports, and dashboards that show unassigned work to help identify incidents at risk of being missed.
result.name: Improve incident assignment time

result.content: Use best practices for process owners and administrators to increase the effectiveness of the ServiceNow experience.
result.sys_name: Follow service catalog and request management best practices
result.name: Follow service catalog and request management best practices

result.content: Eliminate duplicates to improve data quality and, subsequently, enhance the ability to do business impact analysis, asset management, and support IT operations (incident, problem, change, and security).
result.sys_name: Use de-duplication tasks to resolve duplicates
result.name: Use de-duplication tasks to resolve duplicates

result.content:
1. Ensure that the proper approvals are in place, and that it is easy for approvers to respond quickly, to decrease request fulfillment time. Allowing for pre-approval of common low risk requests also speeds up request fulfillment.
  2. Ensure that request fulfillment tasks are correct and route to the proper fulfillment groups to reduce the reassignment of tasks.
result.name: Streamline request fulfillment

result.content:
Use mobile capabilities so your employees remain available and are able to work on the go, from anywhere, on any device. Business leaders expect IT to easily support this seamless work‑anywhere experience. 

Learn more about the ServiceNow native Mobile app.
result.sys_name: Enable mobile capabilities to complete work faster and on the go
result.name: Enable mobile capabilities to complete work faster and on the go

result.content: Use Major Incident Management to help in resolving critical incidents faster.
result.name: Implement Major Incident Management

result.content:
1. Define additional risk conditions and configure Risk Calculation to run by business rule.
  2. Activate Risk Assessment plugin to capture information provided by the end user to derive the risk value of the associated change.
result.sys_name: Implement risk calculation and risk assessment
result.name: Implement risk calculation and risk assessment

result.content: Use workflows that start when a triggering event occurs. Common triggers include a record being inserted into a specific table, or a particular field in a table being set to a specified value. For example, create a workflow that runs whenever a user requests approval for an item they order in the catalog.
result.sys_name: Use workflow for Service Catalog item delivery automation
result.name: Use Workflow for Service Catalog item delivery automation

result.content:
1. Use CMDB to improve the time it takes to determine the cause of an incident and resolve it.
  2. Create business services for CIs to provide an accurate picture of the cause of the outage and what is affected by the outage.
  3. Determine whether other systems of record have data that could be referenced in ServiceNow to negate the need for multiple systems, or repetitive data entry of employee information.
  4. Ensure that high-impact services are reflected in the CMDB and are in sync with environmental changes.

Note: Please work with your System Admin to implement this recommendation using Guided Setup.
result.sys_name: Implement CMDB, and monitor and maintain your CMDB health score
result.name: Implement CMDB, and monitor and maintain your CMDB health score

result.content:
Use Discovery integration to help build an up to date CMDB CI database, which reduces the time to resolve incidents. Learn about Discovery before getting started.

Note: Please work with your System Admin to implement this recommendation using Guided Setup.
result.sys_name: Implement Discovery to increase CI business service map accuracy
result.name: Implement Discovery to increase CI business service map accuracy

result.content:
Use a virtual agent to provide answers to your most frequent requests, which improves incident deflection as well as reduces the time to resolve (TTR). Virtual agent integration can resolve incidents 20% faster.

Talk to your ServiceNow account representative for available integration options.
result.sys_name: Implement a virtual agent to resolve and deflect incidents faster
result.name: Implement a virtual agent to resolve and deflect incidents faster

result.content: Provide your employees with an easy to use Service Catalog that is timely and accurate. Provide access to knowledge articles to answer the most common cases and requests.
result.sys_name: Provide better Service Catalog options to your user
result.name: Provide better Service Catalog options to your user

result.content: Use best practices to improve the search results, such as adding meta tags to articles to help end users find appropriate articles based on how they enter search terms.
result.name: Improve knowledge search capabilities

result.content:
Reduce the number of incidents being incorrectly created as high priority by having end users understand the purpose of Impact and Urgency fields (for example, High Impact means it affects the entire office, versus Low Urgency, which means it needs to be resolved this week). Incidents can be more correctly prioritized when end users understand the purpose of these fields.

For the list of other useful plugins click here.
result.name: Adopt incident resolution Best Practices

result.content:
Use Knowledge Management to create known error articles in your knowledge base.

  1. End users can find solutions, preventing the creation of incidents.
  2. The fulfiller can find answers to known problems without escalating incidents to next level.
  3. You can update or retire articles with a low rating to keep information relevant, which increases KB views.
result.sys_name: Implement Knowledge Management and improve the quality of KB articles
result.name: Implement Knowledge Management and improve the quality of KB articles

result.content: Use business service maps to show the relationship between CMDB CI items. The map is refreshed automatically to reflect changes to the CMDB.
result.name: Implement business service maps

result.content:
Activate plugins for core ITSM applications that include PinkVERIFY and best practice enhancements, if not already active. Proven practice alignment is reduced time-to-value. Other benefits include implementation consistency and easier upgrades.

For the list of other useful plugins click here.
result.name: Implement proven best practice plugins

result.content:
1. Use Social Q&A to extend the Knowledge Management application. Employees can ask and answer questions, which appear in the Knowledge base.

2. With Social Q&A, questions and answers can be voted on to help rank responses.
result.name: Implement Social Q&A

result.content: Process a change request by following best practices. Ensure that you have detected any change conflicts and performed a risk assessment.
result.sys_name: Follow best practices to close a change when completed
result.name: Follow best practices to close a change when completed

result.content: Ensure that CIs are getting updated so users can make better business decisions. The number of stale CIs is a measure of the data quality of the CMDB.
result.sys_name: Ensure that CIs are getting updated regularly in accordance with staleness rules
result.name: Ensure that CIs are getting updated regularly in accordance with staleness rules

result.content:
1. Notify contacts when high priority critical incidents occur.
  2. Go to the official ServiceNow Store to check out other certified notification apps built by our partners.
result.sys_name: Implement Notify, or a third-party notification and escalation app from the ServiceNow store
result.name: Implement Notify, or a third-party notification and escalation app from the ServiceNow store

result.content: Use Structured Problem Analysis to investigate the cause of a problem or incident. Structured problem analysis provides a rational methodology to track the problem analysis process through the ServiceNow system.  The Structured Problem Analysis plugin is available by request.
result.name: Implement Structured Problem Analysis

result.content: Monitor and manage the desired configuration and architectural state of the various CIs, and identify non-compliant CIs.
result.sys_name: Complete audit tasks generated by audit failures (scripted audits and Desired State configurations)
result.name: Complete audit tasks generated by audit failures (scripted audits and desired state configurations)

result.content: Use Service Portal for all your end user experiences like incidents, requests, knowledge articles, etc.
result.name: Implement Service Portal

result.content: Review the number of high priority incidents regularly to discover ways to reduce the count. High priority incidents have a high associated cost and can impact customer satisfaction.
result.sys_name: Review and reduce number of high priority incidents
result.name: Review and reduce number of high priority incidents
